channel.title: [474]Where do you find out the line IDs?
channel.description:
I am trying to add a book system and am wondering where to find out the IDs for the lines. To write a line, I need to use child ids, but cant find those child ids.
Book ID - 111
A little sample of adding text to an interface: [code=java] player.getActionSender().sendString(INTERFACEID, CHILDID, "WHATTOWRITE"); [/code]
Thanks, Arham

item.title: [474]Where do you find out the line IDs?

item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I am trying to add a book system and am wondering where to find out the IDs for the lines. To write a line, I need to use child ids, but cant find those child ids.

Book ID - 111

A little sample of adding text to an interface:

player.getActionSender().sendString(INTERFACEID, CHILDID,  "WHATTOWRITE");

Thanks,
Arham
